# `hexjson` Test

```{r}
library(jsonlite)
library(hexjsonwidget)
jj=fromJSON('./example.hexjson')
hexjsonwidget(jj)
```

```{r}
library(jsonlite)
library(hexjsonwidget)
jj=fromJSON('./example-grid.hexjson')
hexjsonwidget(jj,grid='on')
```


```{r}
library(jsonlite)
library(hexjsonwidget)
jj=fromJSON('./example-grid.hexjson')
hexjsonwidget(jj,grid='off')
```


```{r}
library(jsonlite)
library(hexjsonwidget)
jj=fromJSON('./example-grid.hexjson')
hexjsonwidget(jj)
```



# Screenshot test


#via https://github.com/timelyportfolio/exportwidget/blob/master/Readme.md
library(exportwidget)
library(webshot)
library(htmltools)
library(magrittr)

html_print(tagList(
  hexjsonwidget(jj)
  , export_widget( )
  ), viewer=NULL) %>%
  webshot( delay = 3 )
